detaileddescription.para: Welcome to the Spinner's API documentation! Spinner is a motor control firmware based on the Field Oriented Control (FOC) principles. The firmware is built on top of the Zephyr RTOS, a modern multi-platform RTOS. Spinner is still a proof of concept, so do not expect production grade stability or features.
Some of the offered features are:

listitem.para:
Driver APIs for:
Current sampling
SV-PWM
Feedbacks (e.g. Halls)

detaileddescription.para: These pages contain documentation for all the APIs used in the Spinner firmware. For more details on the Spinner architecture, refer to the contextual documentation pages.
